c:property.name: font

The font used by the label.
See the supported font format in

c:property.name: text
c:property.c:documentation: The text to show in the label.

c:property.name: textStyle
c:property.c:documentation:
The text color.
Note that gradients are not supported in the text style.

c:property.name: textAngle
c:property.c:documentation:
The angle of the text, in radian units.
The text angle is 0 at horizontal direction and grows clock-wise.

c:property.name: textMargin
c:property.c:documentation:
The vertical and horizontal distance that separates the label's anchor point from its associated visual element's anchor point (usually configurable by the option).
The margin is only applied vertically if is not . Likewise, the margin is only applied horizontally if is not . Together, the previous two properties define the label's anchor point.

c:property.name: textDecoration
c:property.c:documentation:
A CSS3 text decoration.

c:property.name: textShadow
c:property.c:documentation:
